Class Answer

java.lang.Object
team.logica_populi.dragonscore.base.logic.Answer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Answer extends Object implements Cloneable
This class represents a possible answer to a question. This answer may or may not be the correct one. It is important to note that is is the job of the UI controller to make sure the questions are displayed in a random order.

      public Answer(String text)
      Constructor to make an Answer using the provided text. The answer defaults to being incorrect.

      correct - Is this answer correct or not.

      public Answer clone()
      Clone the answer into a new instance. It should be noted that given an Answer a 
          a.clone().equals(a);
      will return true.
